definition: overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to love/to pamper/to spoil/to favor
to seem/like/as/if
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: I feel flattered by your invitation.
sentences.chinese: 受到你的邀請，我感到受寵若驚。

sentences.english: I didn't know whether to feel flattered or disgusted.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否感到受寵若驚或厭惡。

sentences.english: I didn no dat. I'm flattered, ty.
sentences.chinese: 我並不想那麼做，我受寵若驚，謝謝你。

sentences.english: I mean, it's flattering, I guess, but couldn't you have done a little better?
sentences.chinese: 雖然我受寵若驚但你找不到更好的人選？

sentences.english: How spoiled we get here. Makes very little difference.
sentences.chinese: 我們真是受寵若驚，不會有所不同。

sentences.english: Everyone treated me so well that I was humbled.
sentences.chinese: 大家對我都很好，我簡直受寵若驚。
“什麼，沒有啊，”丈夫受寵若驚地說。

sentences.english: He said he was flattered to hear about the talk in Las Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 他說他爲那些發生在拉斯維加斯的談話感到受寵若驚。

definition: ashamed and unable to show one's face
to blame sb wrongly
way/method/means/Taiwan pr. [fa1 r5]
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle
to make fun of/to seek diversion
to have tender affection for/to love tenderly/to pamper sb
unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
overjoyed (idiom); as pleased as punch
precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
to have no sense of shame
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
shameless
ashamed and resentful/indignant
coward
public place with numerous people
